Maximal positivity.description:
Only the strongest negativity stands out. The model is very generous with positives, classifying even weakly negative reviews as positive. Negative sentiment is only highlighted when it's clear and intense.
(Threshold = 0.1)

Slightly critical.description:
Let a bit of negativity through. Positive reviews dominate, but clearer negative sentiments will be visible. Still focused on the overall enjoyment but negatives will represent more critical voices.
(Threshold = 0.3)

Balanced perspective.description:
Equal focus on positive and negative. An even split between positive and negative feedback. Both sides of the experience are shown clearly, offering a fair and comprehensive view of the game.
(Threshold = 0.5)

Increasingly skeptical.description:
Highlights dissatisfaction. The model is more critical, with negative feedback gaining prominence. Positivity must be more certain and explicit to stand out.
(Threshold = 0.7)

Highly selective.description:
Only the most clearly positive remain. Reviews are interpreted critically unless they are clearly and strongly favorable.
(Threshold = 0.9)
